mods.abstract: Three color window card (yellow, green and blue on white) Hatch poster announcing the 26th Annual Celebrity Softball Game, Grand Ole Opry vs. iHeart Radio at the First Tennessee Park. Featured artists include Trisha Yearwood, Barry Zito, Charles Esten, David Nail, Vince Gill, Jake Owen, A Thousand Horses, Jessie James Decker, Mark Wils, and others. Poster features a woodcut of a baseball player.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
